main event: On July 8, 1955, three white disc-like objects were observed hovering and circulating around each other in Gulliver, Michigan.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be about 1 foot in diameter., The objects made a swishing, exhaust sound while hovering., The duration of the observation was 2 minutes., The winds were blowing from the west, the same direction as the course of the objects., There was no cited investigation author.
